text: The Parc Olympique Lyonnais is a football stadium in Décines-Charpieu, France and is the home stadium of Olympique Lyonnais. It has a capacity of 59,186. The stadium was opened on 9 January 2016. The stadium was used for the UEFA Euro 2016 and the 2018 UEFA Europa League Final. It has been used for rugby union and ice hockey games, as well as concerts. == Other websites == * Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Football stadiums in France Category:Rhône (department)
title: Parc Olympique Lyonnais
